subtitle: This recipe will spice up a plain roast meal and turn it into something special.

method.text: Place potatoes in a pan of lightly salted boiling water. Cover and simmer for 15 min or until tender. Drain. Allow to cool slightly.
Melt the butter in a small pan, add the lemon grass, chillies and root ginger and fry gently for 5 min or until softened.
Toss the drained new potatoes in the butter. Season to taste.

title: Thai new potatoes
